subs.text: @sivavaid @peterrojas I think that Lenovo fits the bill nicely then. You could spend less but you‚Äôll likely have 4 GB of RAM in the device; more RAM is always better for the ChromeOS experience. This model has 8. Keyboard is pretty solid; at this price it won‚Äôt wow you but it won‚Äôt disappoint either.

subs.text: @ashishmohta @ThatBlairGuy Teslas and other EVs do the same: Charge quickly from 0% to around 75 / 80. Then it gets harder to cram more electrons in the limited space so the charge slows down. The ‚Äúunder-charge‚Äù rule isn‚Äôt to protect from over-charging; it‚Äôs to prevent long-term battery degradation.
subs.rawText: @ashishmohta @ThatBlairGuy Teslas and other EVs do the same: Charge quickly from 0% to around 75 / 80.
